replies.msg: Just had a long and very good call with President Xi of China. Deal is moving along very well. If made, it will be very comprehensive, covering all subjects, areas and points of dispute. Big progress being made!

Hey, I am a journalist working for Globe and Mail, the Canadian national news paper. I’m now doing report over HK ppl’s emotion and fondness to Donald Trump, I read that you’ve posted bunch of contents about him and want to know more. Could you spare some time talking to me and have an interview with me? Reply this message if you are interested in it.
